I have been invited to contribute an article for a book that covers
exampl=
es of beautiful code (those of you who have been programming for
quite a wh=
ile might remember the great book "Programming Pearls" -
this is along the =
same lines.)  The "catch" is that I have to
contribute testing-related exam=
ples - in other words: beautiful test
code.  

I already have some ideas of=
 what to cover, but I thought some of the
people in this group might have s=
ome examples of tests that they
consider particularly "beautiful" or clever=
 in their approach.

I think it's great that developer testing has reached =
the point that
some authors/editors thought of including testing in such a =
book, and
I want to make sure I pick the best possible example(s) to pick f=
rom.

Thanks,

Alberto
